name: The Shifting Tomb
description:
Get lost in the ever-shifting tomb, and climb your way through the floors avoiding your certain doom.

The Shifting Tomb is a first-person horror game created by @JadeKapa and @LeviStenton for the Game Off 2019 Game Jam. 

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move

E - Interact

Left Mouse Button - Use Item

Mouse - Look

Credits:

Programming: Tylah Kapa

Design: Levi Stenton

Special Thanks To:

Brackeys, Blackthornprod, Keijiro Takahashi, Matt Script, PMSFX, Para and Rubberduck

Installation Instructions:

Download the .zip file and extract its contents to a desired folder. Run the game using The Shifting Tomb.exe.
